testcase.name: Validate common scenarios for subtraction via get call
validate subtraction with two int values (happy path)
testcase.system-out:
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/subtract' ................................ passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performSubtraction = function(op1,op2){return op1 - op2} ............ passed * call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} . failed Stack Trace: com.intuit.karate.exception.KarateException: ValidateSubstractionGetAPI.feature:12 - CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:29 - status code was: 200, expected: 400, response time: 15, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract, response: {"result":0} CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:36 - status code was: 200, expected: 400, response time: 22, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract?val1=4, response: {"result":4} CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:43 - status code was: 200, expected: 400, response time: 10, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract?val2=5, response: {"result":-5} [6.1:55] CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:51 - status code was: 404, expected: 400, response time: 38, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract?val1=3.8&val2=4.9, response: HTTP Status 404 – Not Found
